sentences.en: An active placebo mimics the side effects of the experimental drug.
sentences.cn: 一种有效的对照剂模拟出了这种实验性药物的副作用.

sentences.en: Criteria for inclusion of treatment trials were randomization and placebo control.
sentences.cn: 治疗试验入选的标准包括随机选择和安慰剂对照.

sentences.en: DESIGN: Randomized, single blind and placebo control prospective study based on patients.
sentences.cn: 设计: 以患者为研究对象,随机 、 盲、慰剂对照的前瞻性研究.

sentences.en: How come they didn't trigger a placebo effect?
sentences.cn: 药片怎么没触发安慰剂效应?

sentences.en: Improvement After Arthroscopy: The Placebo Effect?
sentences.cn: 关节镜检查后的改善: 安慰效应?

sentences.en: Methods A multicenter, randomized, double - blind , placebo - controlled study was carried ont.
sentences.cn: 方法多中心 、 随机 、 双盲 、 安慰剂对照研究.

sentences.en: Methods A multicenter, randomized, double - blind , placebo - controlled, parallel design, 6 - week study was performed.
sentences.cn: 方法多中心 、 随机双盲 、 安慰剂对照 、 平行设计临床试验.

sentences.en: Methods A randomized double - dummy placebo - controlled study.
sentences.cn: 方法采用随机双盲、空白对照的临床观察.

sentences.en: Methods: A randomized, double - blind, placebo add - on was taken.
sentences.cn: 方法: 随机双盲, 添加治疗安慰剂对照临床试验.

sentences.en: Or it could be that the needles caused a “super placebo” effect, triggering a real reaction in the brain that changes the way the body perceives and responds to pain.
sentences.cn: 或者是因为针灸造成了一种“超级安慰剂”效应，并触发了大脑内的一个反应，这种反应能改变身体对疼痛信号的感知和回应。

sentences.en: Placebo effect effect of taking a placebo.
sentences.cn: 宽慰作用(服安慰剂后的).

sentences.en: The placebo effect can be understood only if we acknowledge the unity of mind and body.
sentences.cn: 只有我们承认身心一体，安慰剂效果才能被理解。

sentences.en: The placebo effect refers to all the observable behaviors caused by placebo.
sentences.cn: 安慰剂效应是指由安慰剂所引起的可观察的行为.

sentences.en: The placebo has been found to work with a lot of different cases.
sentences.cn: 人们已发现安慰剂能在很多不同的病例中发挥作用。

sentences.en: The results in comparison to placebo strongly suggest that MPS is absorbed.
sentences.cn: 这些结论与安慰剂对照,均提示MPS(多磺酸粘多糖)吸收非常良好.

trans.tran_cn: 安慰剂，宽心话，为死者所诵的晚祷词，（试验药物用的）无效对照剂
trans.tran_en: when someone feels better after taking a placebo, even though it has not had any effect on their body
